segments.text: I see the boy on that stool, and it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high to reach those cookies, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his sister standing right there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she can't wait to get her hands on that treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both going to be in trouble if their mom catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also think it's kind of cute how they're working together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined, and I admire his focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't fall and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a risky move, but I can't help but root for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, or if this is their first cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR
